welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Homer Glen, the charming town known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all air freight shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a small fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
